page.title: 20Game Bird Shooting
page.content:
On the lower slopes of the hills in our area and on the widespread moorland, land owners combine{sheep grazing with{grouse}and{pheasant management.
The{"Glorious Twelfth", August 12th, is an important day - the beginning of the grouse shooting season which lasts until December 10th.
Game bird shooting is an expensive sport. Buying a good shotgun would cost from Â£500 to Â£1000. A rifle with telescopic sight would also cost from Â£500 upwards.
Package holidays are available locally. A{week's shooting}would cost in the region of{Â£1000.
